name.en: Design and Implementation of Digital Materials for Hakka E-Learning

department.en: Department of Hakka Language and Social Sciences
department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系

goal.en: This course is the overall course of the Hakka language and innovation micro-learning course. Through the aforementioned design thinking, Hakura resource investigation and knowledge base construction, and the training and training of programming courses, students will be able to develop localized based on the results of the Hakka language digital teaching material project, and we started to design and implement the project. We used this to test the effectiveness of the students studying in this micro-learning course. In this course, experts or professional teachers inside and outside the school will be hired to assist students in planning projects in the early part of the semester, and they will give comments at the end of the semester. When the course is in progress in the latter part of the semester, the teachers will not actively provide technical guidance but only provide suggestions and suggestions for ideas. Relevant resources give students more room to play, with students as the main body to solve problems and teachers and industry teachers as the role of consultation. The evaluation is based on the weight of the core competencies related to this course. In addition to the teacher's grade-by-item, peer-to-peer evaluation and learner selection also increase the interaction between knowledge producers and their peers and learners. The basis for the effectiveness of the course teaching.
goal.ch: 本課程為客家語文智慧創新微學程的總整課程，透過前述設計思考、客庄資源調查及知識庫建置、程式設計類別課程的培養和訓練，修課學生將以開發出在地化的客家語文數位教材專案成果為目標，著手設計與專案實作，並以此檢驗修課學生於本微學程學習之成效。在這個課程中，將聘請校內外專家或業師在學期前段協助學生規劃專案，並於期末評選上給予意見，學期後段的課程進行時，授課教師則不主動提供技術指導，僅針對想法提供建議及相關資源，給予學生更多的發揮空間，以學生解決問題為主體，授課教師和業師為諮詢之角色。評量方面是以本課程相關的核心能力分項權重，除了授課教師依項評分外，也加入同儕互評和學習者評選，增加知識生產者與同儕及學習者的互動，並且做為檢視微學程教學成效的依據。

content.en: This course is the overall course of the Hakka language innovation micro-learning course. The students will develop the localized Hakka language digital teaching material project results based on the chatbot platform. Therefore, each group needs to curate a chatbot on a specific topic and display and evaluate it in the classroom.
content.ch: 本課程為客家語文智慧創新微學程的總整課程，修課學生將以開發出以聊天機器人為平台的在地化的客家語文數位教材專案成果為目標。因此，每組需策展一個特定主題的聊天機器人，並依備註中所指定時間在課堂中進行展示與評價。需在指定時間並全組出席進行報告。

textbook.en: 1. Rao Menghuan. (2020). LINE Bot by Python full strategy: from Heroku to AWS cross-platform practice. Boshuo. 2. Huang Shijia and Lin Jingjie. (2019). Easily learn LINE programming and AI chatbot implementation and development. Boshuo.
textbook.ch: 1、 饒孟桓。(2020)。LINE Bot by Python 全攻略：從Heroku到AWS跨平台實踐。博碩。 2、 黃士嘉、林敬傑。(2019)。輕鬆學會LINE程式設計與AI聊天機器人實作開發。博碩。

grading.en: 1. Attendance rate: 10% 2. Homework and classroom activities: 30% 3. Proposal, group topic (web page introduction, video): 15% + 45%
